group_1.narration: <With one week left until Valentine's Day,@Manaka went through a lot of trial and error to create@a chocolate that would guarantee a successful confession,@and came up with fourteen different products.>
<Even from a casual observer's perspective,@it became apparent that fatigue was setting in.@Will Manaka be able to pull through?>

group_1.textLeft: Th-this is...!

group_1.textRight: How about this one?
It's a slightly larger block of ganache!
On top of it,
there's a pair of wings sprouting out,@made from white chocolate!
And that's not all!
We have cocoa powder scattered@as though a breeze passed through,
and flakes of gold leaf to resemble the starry skies!
The chocolate flies to you with love, and the feelings@it carries meld with yours as it melts in your heart!!
Behold! The perfect "I want to@become one with you" chocolate!

group_1.textLeft: I have no clue what you're talking about.@Are you completely lost?
Like, these wings are so huge that@you had to hold them up with pretzels.

group_1.textRight: Well, how do you feel about it, Ria-senpai...?

group_1.textLeft: ...You've been trying so hard that I@don't know how to break it to you.

group_1.textRight: Alright...

group_1.textLeft: A box with wings...
It's making me think of gliders@from the Birdman Rally.
Erm, but, if someone were actually giving it to me,@I'd probably have a different reaction!

group_1.textRight: No, it's no good. It was a failure the moment@you had to mince words about it...
And it's not supposed to be a glider, either...

group_1.textCenter: Ria, why did you call me over all of a sudden?

[chara:303201:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]Err, why is there a camera here?!@[chara:303201:lipSynch_0][wait:1.0][chara:303201:cheek_1][chara:303201:face_mtn_ex_030.exp.json][chara:303201:lipSynch_1][chara:303201:eyeClose_1]This is embarrassing...

group_1.textRight: It's too late to fix your hair...
Still, why'd you call Mayu-senpai over?

group_1.textLeft: Didn't I tell you? You don't know what will happen@unless you actually give it to someone else.
Uh, Ria, what's going on?
Oh, that's a beautiful piece of chocolate.

group_1.textRight: I made it for you.

group_1.textLeft: What?

group_1.textRight: Mayu, go out with me!

group_1.textLeft: Huh? What?
[bgEffect:shakeLarge]Ehhhhhhh?!
...[wait:2.0][chara:303201:lipSynch_1]Ah.

[chara:303201:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]I see, that explains the camera!@[chara:303201:lipSynch_0][wait:1.0][chara:303201:cheek_1][chara:303201:face_mtn_ex_030.exp.json][chara:303201:lipSynch_1]But it's rude to surprise someone like that.

group_1.textRight: Goddammit!
We failed the test...

group_1.textLeft: Good grief, what are you two even@talking about right now?

group_1.textRight: I wanted to see if this chocolate could@convey someone's feelings...
I was commissioned to make a chocolate that@guarantees a successful confession.
I've been trying out a lot of things...

group_1.textLeft: Oh, that's what happened...

group_1.textRight: Mayu-senpai...tell me the truth:@What do you think of the chocolate?

group_1.textLeft: Hmm...if you want me to be honest...

group_1.textRight: Yes...

group_1.textLeft: I thought it looked like some kind of@glider from the Birdman Rally.

group_1.textRight: [chara:300901:effect_emotion_sad_0][se:7224_fall_into]Seriously, I didn't think you'd@both see the same thing...

group_1.narration: <Later that same evening,@after that critical appraisal of her work,@Manaka visited downtown Sakae.>
Are you sure you don't want to take a break?

group_1.textCenter: I know I'm tired of all this.
But I want to make sure the customer@is satisfied with her order.
And as a chef at Walnut's,@I want to put proper care into my work as well.
That said, it's frustrating that@I'm not making any progress...
The past few days have been a shuttle relay@between lofty ideas and harsh reality.
Like Ria-senpai said, I'm so caught up@in theory that I'm completely lost...
I see.@We haven't thought outside the box at all yet...

group_1.narration: <She noticed something, thought for a moment,@then rushed back to the store.>

group_1.textLeft: Like an actual proposal...

group_1.textRight: It's a confession of actual, true love.

group_1.textLeft: When you want to make that happen, you need@something that sparkles like an actual jewel.

group_1.textRight: We were so caught up with Valentine's Day@itself that we overlooked this.

group_1.textLeft: That's right.

group_1.narration: <It was then that Walnut's locked down@the direction of their next project.>
What chocolate will you make next?

group_1.textCenter: It'll be be a ring that looks like it has a real gem, like@what people exchange with their wedding vows.
